property.name: createRoleQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.role ( id, name, predefined, user_default, default_storage_id) VALUES ( :ROLE_ID, :ROLE_NAME, :ROLE_PREDEFINED, :ROLE_USER_DEFAULT, :ROLE_DEFAULT_STORAGE_ID)

property.name: updateRoleQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.role SET name = :ROLE_NAME, user_default = :ROLE_USER_DEFAULT, default_storage_id = :ROLE_DEFAULT_STORAGE_ID WHERE id = :ROLE_ID

property.name: loadRoleQuery
property.value: SELECT r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.predefined as role_predefined, r.user_default as role_user_default, r.default_storage_id as role_default_storage_id FROM pipeline.role r WHERE r.id = ?

property.name: loadRolesByStorageIdQuery
property.value: SELECT r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.predefined as role_predefined, r.user_default as role_user_default, r.default_storage_id as role_default_storage_id FROM pipeline.role r WHERE r.default_storage_id = ?

property.name: loadRoleByNameQuery
property.value: SELECT r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.predefined as role_predefined, r.user_default as role_user_default, r.default_storage_id as role_default_storage_id FROM pipeline.role r WHERE r.name = ?

property.name: loadRoleListQuery
property.value: SELECT r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.predefined as role_predefined, r.user_default as role_user_default, r.default_storage_id as role_default_storage_id FROM pipeline.role r WHERE r.id in (:IDS)

property.name: loadAllRolesQuery
property.value: SELECT r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.predefined as role_predefined, r.user_default as role_user_default, r.default_storage_id as role_default_storage_id FROM pipeline.role r

property.name: loadUserDefaultRolesQuery
property.value: SELECT r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.predefined as role_predefined, r.user_default as role_user_default, r.default_storage_id as role_default_storage_id FROM pipeline.role r WHERE r.user_default = TRUE

property.name: loadRolesWithUsersQuery
property.value: SELECT r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.predefined as role_predefined, r.user_default as role_user_default, r.default_storage_id as role_default_storage_id, u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, u.groups as user_groups, u.attributes as attributes, u.default_storage_id as user_default_storage_id FROM pipeline.role r LEFT JOIN pipeline.user_roles m ON r.id = m.role_id LEFT JOIN pipeline.user u ON m.user_id = u.id;

property.name: loadRoleWithUsersQuery
property.value: SELECT r.id as role_id, r.name as role_name, r.predefined as role_predefined, r.user_default as role_user_default, r.default_storage_id as role_default_storage_id, u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, u.groups as user_groups, u.attributes as attributes, u.default_storage_id as user_default_storage_id FROM pipeline.role r LEFT JOIN pipeline.user_roles m ON r.id = m.role_id LEFT JOIN pipeline.user u ON m.user_id = u.id WHERE r.id = ?;
